pr_title: Core: Fix invalidation of metadata tables in CachingCatalog

timeline.author: aokolnychyi

timeline.message: Core: Fix invalidation of metadata tables in CachingCatalog
Core: Fix invalidation of metadata tables in CachingCatalog

timeline.bodyText: If we alter table properties (to change metadata partitioning for example) do we want to invalidate in that case as well?
timeline.author: RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: I think that is already taken care of since CachingCatalog forces the same TableOperations object to be used for metadata and main tables.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText: There is another test in TestCachingCatalog for that.
replies.author: aokolnychyi
